headline: Paychex Acquisition Of Paycor Expands Platform And Deepens Client Relationships
summary: Paychex (NasdaqGS:PAYX) has completed its acquisition of rival Paycor, combining two human capital management platforms. The transaction significantly expands Paychex’s revenue base and broadens its product portfolio. The company has also introduced Bill Pay, a financial management tool integrated into its core platform. For you as an investor, this moves Paychex further beyond payroll into a wider set of human capital and financial tools for employers. The Paycor deal brings in additional...
